remote-for-slides.title: Remote for Slides
remote-for-slides.description:
Remote for Slides is a Chrome Extension and a Progressive Web App that allows you to control Google Slides and Ludus on any device, remotely, without the need for any extra hardware.

 Remote for Slides is built using a web framework called Preact, a fast 3kb React alternative, and Firebase, a mobile and web application development platform by Google.

 Remote for Slides is featured on The Next Web and more.

related.title: Turn your phone into a Google Slides remote control with this Chrome extension
related.subtitle: The Next Web

related.title: Meet Remote for Slides, a new way to control your presentation slides
related.subtitle: Medium.com

github-issues-voter.description: Best Progressive Web App at the Google's Firebase Static Showdown 2016 Global Hackathon. GitHub Issues Voter is a progressive web app that allow you to upvote or downvote to any GitHub issues you interested.
